text: Whoever, during the life or after the death of the testator, for a fraudulent purpose, takes and carries away, or destroys, mutilates, or secretes, a testamentary instrument, shall be imprisoned not more than five years.

heading.catch_text: Taking and carrying away, or destroying, mutilating, or secreting will.
